languages.text: {n}Мастер дисциплины откашливается.{/n} "Служители культа есть чистильщики гнили, бич нечестивцев. Блюстители уважают ткачей Кровавой паутины, ибо, подобно нам, они несут свет Его и кару Его в самые темные глубины корабля".

{n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины откашливается.{/n} "Служители культа есть чистильщики гнили, бич нечестивцев. Блюстители уважают ткачей Кровавой паутины, ибо, подобно нам, они несут свет Его и кару Его в самые темные глубины корабля".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master Disciplinarian clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the cleansers of rot, the scourge of the unrighteous. Enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web weavers, for just like us, they bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

{n}The Master Disciplinarian clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the cleansers of rot, the scourge of the unrighteous. Enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web weavers, for just like us, they bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

{n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. Enforcers respect the weavers of the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

{n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. Enforcers respect the weavers of the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

{n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

{n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes se racle la gorge.{/n} « Les cultistes sont le fléau des séditieux. Ils mènent les impies à la ruine. Les prévôts ont le plus grand respect pour la Toile de Sang, car nous partageons un objectif commun : apporter Sa lumière et Sa justice jusque dans les profondeurs les plus sombres de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes se racle la gorge.{/n} « Les cultistes sont le fléau des séditieux. Ils mènent les impies à la ruine. Les prévôts ont le plus grand respect pour la Toile de Sang, car nous partageons un objectif commun : apporter Sa lumière et Sa justice jusque dans les profondeurs les plus sombres de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas carraspea.{/n} «Los cultistas son la perdición de los sediciosos. Llevan a los injustos a la ruina. Los guardias respetan a la Red Sanguinolenta, pues comparten nuestro mismo objetivo: llevar Su luz y Su justicia impasible a las profundidades más negras de esta nave».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas carraspea.{/n} «Los cultistas son la perdición de los sediciosos. Llevan a los injustos a la ruina. Los guardias respetan a la Red Sanguinolenta, pues comparten nuestro mismo objetivo: llevar Su luz y Su justicia impasible a las profundidades más negras de esta nave».

languages.text: {n}戒律大师清了清喉咙。{/n}“这些教派成员是煽动者的天敌，他们会为不义之人带来死亡。所有执法者都尊重织血罗网的成员，因为我们都有着共同的目标，那就是——将神皇的明光与祂严厉的正义带到这艘船最黑暗的深处。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师清了清喉咙。{/n}“这些教派成员是煽动者的天敌，他们会为不义之人带来死亡。所有执法者都尊重织血罗网的成员，因为我们都有着共同的目标，那就是——将神皇的明光与祂严厉的正义带到这艘船最黑暗的深处。”

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは咳ばらいをした。{/n}カルト信者は扇動者の災いです。彼らは不義を破滅に導く。エンフォーサーはブラッドスパン・ウェブを尊敬しています。それは、共通の目標を共有しているからです。この船の最も暗い深みに、主の光と厳しい正義をもたらすという目的…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは咳ばらいをした。{/n}カルト信者は扇動者の災いです。彼らは不義を破滅に導く。エンフォーサーはブラッドスパン・ウェブのウィーバーを尊敬しています。それは、共通の目標を共有しているからです。この船の最も暗い深みに、主の光と厳しい正義をもたらすという目的…」

languages.text: {n}Die Waffenmeisterin räuspert sich.{/n} "Die Kultisten sind die Geißel der Aufrührer. Der Untergang der Unrechtschaffenen. Enforcer respektieren die Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes, denn wir haben dasselbe Ziel — Sein Licht und Seine strenge Gerechtigkeit in die dunkelsten Winkel dieses Schiffs zu tragen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Waffenmeisterin räuspert sich.{/n} "Die Kultisten sind die Geißel der Aufrührer. Der Untergang der Unrechtschaffenen. Enforcer respektieren die Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes, denn wir haben dasselbe Ziel — Sein Licht und Seine strenge Gerechtigkeit in die dunkelsten Winkel dieses Schiffs zu tragen."

languages.text: {n}Silahtar boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Tarikatçılar, fitnecilerin musibetidir. Erdemden yoksun olanları perişan eder. İnfazcılar, Kanipi Ağı'na hürmet ediyor çünkü ortak bir gayemiz var. Bu gaye de O'nun ışığını ve merhametsiz adaletini bu geminin en karanlık köşelerine dek ulaştırmak."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms clears her throat.{/n} "The cultists are the scourge of the seditious. They bring the unrighteous to ruin. The enforcers respect the Bloodspun Web, for we share a common goal — to bring His light and His harsh justice to the darkest depths of this ship."
